TopicTitle: My upcoming absence from the forums

Articles.Content: In 2 days I will be going to my home state of California. I will be absent from the forums for 2 weeks. Just a random heads up which serves no purpose to all of you. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Have fun!
Have fun.. This is weird, my dad was just there to visit my uncle a few weeks ago...
I\'ll be away in the next weeks too, funny ;D
cant you connet there

Yes, but there will be no computers. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Leaving today at 6:45 PM Central Daylight Time.

> 
> Yes, but there will be no computers. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> 
> Leaving today at 6:45 PM Central Daylight Time.

smart phone?

> 
> smart phone?

I am twelve and I don\'t own a phone. (Don\'t want one yet. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

Maybe I could connect with my 3DS?

> 
> I am twelve and I don\'t own a phone. (Don\'t want one yet. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))
> 
> Maybe I could connect with my 3DS?

im 13 but you could ask you mun/dad to brow there laptop/smartphone

> 
> im 13 but you could ask you mun/dad to brow there laptop/smartphone

Or he could enjoy his holiday, and not worry about a bunch of ninnys on the internet.

I\'m assuming you\'re going to be outside, so... 

[mom]Put on sunscreen or you\'ll die young![/mom]

> 
> I\'m assuming you\'re going to be outside, so... 
> 
> [mom]Put on sunscreen or you\'ll die young![/mom]

I will wear sunscreen when I go to the beach. When I went to California in 2010 I built a sand castle which could withstand waves...until a really big wave came and broke it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> 
> I will wear sunscreen when I go to the beach. When I went to California in 2010 I built a sand castle which could withstand waves...until a really big wave came and broke it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Its fun to build one purposefully to deflect waves, and when the tide comes in, see how long it lasts ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

> 
> Its fun to build one purposefully to deflect waves, and when the tide comes in, see how long it lasts ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).

I was wave after wave for a long time. There was just one big wave that broke it. Gonna do better this year. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
make a pretection dam ;D

> 
> make a pretection dam ;D

THE TIDE

IT IS THE DESTROYER OF FORTRESSES

NOTHING CAN WITHSTAND ITS WRATH
Try mining rocks to put around it. Try finding rocks I mean... Too much minecraft...

Somehow last year my father and I made on where it survived the tide. Came to the beach the next morning and it was still standing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Leaving in 30 Minutes!
No one cares, but I live in CA. 8)

> 
> Try mining rocks to put around it. Try finding rocks I mean... Too much minecraft...

ROFL 

ON-TOPIC: good-bye!
Your sand castle needs MORE STRUTS!!!!
Alright I am in California right now, i have been here for 6 days. I am lucky my aunt had a computer. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
how was your castel?
